divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my fianc���e was driving on I- 75 South around 5:46 am. I was sitting in the passenger seat. The road was very dark during this time. My girlfriend was complaining so I put on my headphones. I seen a bright circular object appear halfway in the sky then fell at an angle towards the earth as we approached Dixie HWY and I -75 in the wooded area. It fell Southwest of our current location. I sat there for a moment and thought to my self for about 3-4 minutes. So I took my headphones off and ask my girlfriend did she see that? She said " thing thing that fell from the sky". I was like yeah. SO we both had seen it. I had to make sure my eyes weren't only playing a trick on me.Thats when I told her it must of been a UFO. I told her that there has been alot of sightings lately like in New York and Texas. I felt weird after seeing that.
Summary: Fell at at angle towards towards the earth.
trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Flint
There were no other sightings in Flint on or around October 19th 2010
